name: Shoyu Ahi
description: Our signature. A proprietary blend of shoyu, fresh ginger, and sesame that lets the premium fish shine through.

name: Shoyu Tako
description: The octopus version of our classic. Secret shoyu blend with chili, perfectly coating the chewy tako.

name: Hawaiian Style Ahi
description: Pre-colonial style. No soy sauce—just Alaea salt, limu (seaweed), and inamona (roasted kukui nut) for authentic island flavor.

name: Hawaiian Style Tako
description: The purist's octopus. Salt, limu, and chili allow the natural sweetness of the tako to take center stage.

name: Miso Ahi
description: Rich miso paste and a touch of sweetness create a creamy, savory glaze without any dairy.

name: Miso Tako
description: Miso-glazed octopus with natural tenderizing from the fermented paste. A unique, slightly sweet option.

name: Spicy Ahi
description: The crowd favorite. Creamy mayo, chili oil, and tobiko (fish roe) deliver the perfect balance of heat and richness.

name: Wasabi Ahi
description: Sharp wasabi and shoyu for that clean, nasal heat. Not overpowering—just perfectly zesty.
